title: 唱片机材质
author: smallcrystal
txt_content: 想制作一个自己的客户端，但是唱片机的音乐文件难到了我，我想要一个唱片机材质包，只要将材质包里面的音乐替换掉就能修改唱片机音乐，谁能帮帮我吗？在线等~~

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
材质包？那不是 1.6 就已经移除了么。


原版的 sounds.json 中定义的所有唱片路径：
assets/minecraft/sounds/records/11.ogg
assets/minecraft/sounds/records/13.ogg
assets/minecraft/sounds/records/blocks.ogg
assets/minecraft/sounds/records/cat.ogg
assets/minecraft/sounds/records/chirp.ogg
assets/minecraft/sounds/records/far.ogg
assets/minecraft/sounds/records/mall.ogg
assets/minecraft/sounds/records/mellohi.ogg
assets/minecraft/sounds/records/stal.ogg
assets/minecraft/sounds/records/strad.ogg
assets/minecraft/sounds/records/wait.ogg
assets/minecraft/sounds/records/ward.ogg

在不修改 sounds.json 的前提下，你只要把你的 ogg 文件（不要用格式工厂转换出来的）放到你的资源包中以上路径中就行了。
